column3: merekyerɛw iyinom abrɛ hom ama hom aannyɛ bɔn. Na sɛ obi yɛ bɔn a
column4: yɛwɔ ɔkasamaafo a otwitwa gye hɛn wɔ Egya no nkyɛn

column2: "na ɔno nye hɛn bɔn ho mpatadze
column3: na nnyɛ hɛn nko hɛndze
column4: na mbom wiadze nyina so dze bi."

column3: iyiara na yɛdze hu dɛ yenyim no."
Minyim no
column4: na onndzi n’ahyɛdze do no
column6: na nokwar no nnyi no mu:"

column2: "na obiara a odzi n’asɛm do no
column3: ɔno no mu na ampaara Nyankopɔn no dɔ no edzi mu. Iyi na yɛdze hu dɛ yɛwɔ no mu:"

column2: "nyia ɔka dɛ ɔtse no mu no
column3: ɔsɛ no dɛ ɔnantsew dɛ mbrɛ ɔno so nantsewee."
nnyɛ ahyɛdze fofor bi na merekyerɛw abrɛ hom
column4: na mbom ahyɛdze dadaw no nye asɛm a ofi ahyɛse no hom atse no ara."

column3: merekyerɛw ahyɛdze fofor abrɛ hom a ɔyɛ nokwar wɔ ɔno nye hom mu; osiandɛ sum rutwa mu
column4: na nokwar kan no enya rehyerɛn."

column2: "Nyia ɔka dɛ ɔwɔ kan no mu
column3: na ɔtan no nua no
column4: ɔwɔ sum mu dze besi sesei."

column3: ɔwɔ kan no mu
column4: na fintsidua bi nnyi no mu."

column2: "Na nyia ɔtan no nua tse sum mu
column3: na ɔnantsew sum mu
column4: na onnyim mbrɛ ɔrokɔ

column3: me mba nkakraba
column4: osiandɛ wɔdze hom bɔn akyɛ hom wɔ ne dzin ntsi."

column3: egyanom
column4: osiandɛ hom nyim nyia ɔwɔ hɔ fitsi ahyɛse no. Merekyerɛw abrɛ hom
column6: osiandɛ hom edzi ɔbɔn no do konyim."

column3: mbofra nkakraba
column4: osiandɛ hom nyim Egya no. Merekyerɛw abrɛ hom
column6: osiandɛ hom ehu nyia ɔwɔ hɔ fitsi ahyɛse no. Merekyerɛw abrɛ hom mberantsɛ osiandɛ hom yɛ dzen
column7: na Nyankopɔn asɛm tse hom mu
column8: na hom edzi ɔbɔn no do konyim."

column3: anaadɛ ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ wiadze. Na nyia ɔdɔ wiadze no
column4: Egya no ho dɔ nnyi no mu."

column2: "Na dza ɔwɔ wiadze a ɔyɛ honam akɔndɔ
column3: enyiwa akɔndɔ
column4: nye asetsena mu enyimnyampɛ nyina no

column3: naaso nyia ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn n’apɛdze no dze
column4: ɔtsena hɔ daa."

column3: dɔnhwer a odzi ekyir no nye yi: na dɛ mbrɛ hom atse dɛ antikraest rebɛba no
column4: sesei mpo antikraest pii aba; nna yɛdze hu dɛ dɔn a odzi ekyir no ara nye yi."

column3: naaso wɔnnka hɛn ho
column4: na sɛ wɔka hɛn ho a
column5: nkyɛ wɔnye hɛn tsenaa hɔ: na wofii mu ama aada edzi dɛ hɔn nyina nnka hɛn ho."

column3: hom enya ngosera bi fi Krɔnkrɔnnyi no hɔ
column4: na hom nyim adze nyina."

column2: "Mannkyerɛw ammbrɛ hom dɛ hom nnyim nokwar no
column3: na mbom dɛ hom nyim
column4: na dɛ ator biara mmfi nokwar no mu."

column2: "Woana na ɔyɛ ɔtorfo dɛ nyia ɔpow dɛ Jesus nye Kraest no? Oyi nye antikraest no
column3: nyia ɔpow Egya nye Ba no."
onnyi Egya no; na nyia ɔpaa mu bɔ Ɔba no ne dzin no
column4: ɔwɔ Egya no so."

column3: hom mma dza ofi ahyɛse no hom tsee no ntsena hom mu. Na sɛ dza hom fi ahyɛse tsee no tsena hom mu a
column4: hom bɛtsena Ɔba no nye Egya no so mu."

column2: "Na anohoba a ɔabɔ hɛn nye onnyiewiei nkwa."
"Iyinom na makyerɛw abrɛ hom wɔ hɔn a wɔpɛ dɛ wɔma hom fom kwan no ho."

column3: ngosera a hom nyae wɔ ne nsamu no tse hom mu
column4: na onnhia hom dɛ obi kyerɛkyerɛ hom
column5: na mbom dɛ mbrɛ no ngosera no ara kyerɛkyerɛ hom wɔ adze nyina ho no. Ɔyɛ nokwar
column7: na dɛ mbrɛ ɔakyerɛkyerɛ hom no
column8: ɔno ara na hom ntsena mu."

column3: me mba nkakraba
column4: hom ntsena no mu; na sɛ oyi noho edzi a
column6: na hɛn enyi annto n’enyim wɔ ne ba no mu."

column2: "Sɛ hom nyim dɛ ɔyɛ tseneneenyi a
column3: hom nhu dɛ obiara a ɔyɛ dza ɔtsen no
column4: ɔno na Nyankopɔn awo no."
